name: Shipmates
headline: Shipping platform for online merchants in the Philippines
description:
Shipmates is a shipping platform that enables online business owners to book on-demand and standard orders using multiple couriers in the Philippines. An alternative to the hassles of manual booking and shipping. Shipmates helps e-commerce businesses grow by making their shipping process easier and faster.

Launched in 2021, Shipmates was engineered to simplify logistics and scale businesses by allowing business owners to book shipments in bulk from different couriers in just a few clicks. Users have the option to connect their Shopify website to our platform or upload their orders using an excel file. Shipmates is currently in partnership with six couriers: Lalamove, Borzo, Grab, XDE, Entrego, and J&T as we work on adding more courier options. The platform also allows for nationwide shipping, Cash on Delivery and free courier pick-ups for the convenience of business owners.

We believe that online businesses deserve more support for shipping which is why we built solutions through continuous product development and simplicity in design.

# Shipping platform for your Face|
Book standard and same-day couriers.

### Booking couriers made easier.
Compare rates and choose between on-demand and standard couriers without the hassle of using multiple apps and websites.
How does it work?watch video
### Step 1
Connect your online store, upload your Excel file, or add orders one by one
### Step 2
Check your orders

### Step 3

Book for shipping

##### Features and Benefits
### Conveniently book different couriers to ship orders in one shipping platform
#### Book Bulk Shipments
Conveniently book different couriers to ship orders in one courier platform
#### Compare Courier Rates
Check out their rates and find your best shipping option
#### Cash on Delivery
Use cash-on-delivery services from our standard couriers and get paid weekly!
#### Track Shipments
Track all your shipments in one platform and be able to update your customers about their orders at any time.
#### Automatic Waybills
Our platform automatically generates a waybill with the complete information of your customers.
![book bulk shipments](https://shipmates.app/_next/image?url=%2Ffeatures%2FShipmates-Website-Icons-2-01.png&w=3840&q=75)

![book bulk shipments](https://shipmates.app/_next/image?url=%2Ffeatures%2FShipmates-Website-Icons-2-05.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Start shipping with Shipmates today!
Sign up and book with any of our partner couriers.
[Request for Demo](https://shipmates.app/<https:/calendly.com/shipmatesdemo>)[Start Shipping](https://shipmates.app/</signup>)
##### Customer Feedback
### Need a little more push? Take it from them!
Check out what our clients have to say. 
![](https://shipmates.app/SM-NoahPoses_2 Thumbs 1.svg)
![Alt text](https://shipmates.app/testimonials/Ava-and-Ava_Logo.png)
###### Addie, Ava & Ava
It really made shipping easier be it same day or provincial. Shopify integration saves us a lot time vs booking each order one by one. Zoie is very responsive and has been really quick and helpful whenever we have an issue. Thanks, Shipmates!
![Alt text](https://shipmates.app/testimonials/HGHMNDS_Logo.png)
###### Chrislyn, HGHMNDS CLOTHING
I am very happy with the performance of the new dashboard. Shipmates is very convenient for us because everything is on one platform. Hoping to continue to use Shipmates in the future!
![Alt text](https://shipmates.app/testimonials/Pedal-Cafe_Logo.png)
###### Amica, Pedal Cafe
I really love how it helped streamline our process. Having a dashboard accessible by the ops team is a great help! I used to book from my account and I'd send money to whoever is in charge that day.
![Alt text](https://shipmates.app/testimonials/Twin-Starr_Logo.png)
###### Alexa, Twin Starr Tailoring
We really love working with Shipmates! Shipmates helped us systematize our fulfillment process. The platform is intuitive and customer support is on point. Organizing shipments have always been a stress point especially in comparing rates and recording deliveries but Shipmates has made that a breeze for us.

see more ![right arrow](https://shipmates.app/big-right-arrow.svg)

##### Platform Fees
### Pay per use only
Enjoy the same shipping service at all shipper levels but get lower rates as you ship more!
## Level 1 Shipper
###### No minimum shipments required
₱10.00 / Per Booking
## Level 2 Shipper
###### Minimum 500 monthly shipments
₱7.50 / Per Booking
## Level 3 Shipper
###### Minimum 1,000 monthly shipments
₱5.00 / Per Booking
### On-Demand Couriers
![Alt text](https://shipmates.app/grab.svg)![Alt text](https://shipmates.app/lalamove.svg)
### Standard Couriers
![Alt text](https://shipmates.app/gogo.svg)![Alt text](https://shipmates.app/jandt.svg)![Alt text](https://shipmates.app/lbc.svg)
[Schedule a Meeting ![right arrow](https://shipmates.app/right-arrow-violet.svg)](https://shipmates.app/<https:/calendly.com/shipmatesdemo>)[Sign Up Free](https://shipmates.app/</signup>)
##### Frequently Asked Questions
### Need help?
I don’t have a website, can I still use Shipmates?
Yes! Aside from our Shopify integration, you can also manually upload your bulk orders using our Excel file template or add orders individually. We also have a dedicated Shipment Manager to help organize, book, and track your orders. Message partnerships@shipmates.app for more information!
How can I access my Shipmates account? Do you have an app?
You may access your Shipmates account through a web browser. We are currently working on our mobile app, but we’ll definitely announce when it’s up!
Is Shipmates free? 
It's free to sign up. We do not charge any subscription fees, there is only a platform fee charged by Shipmates on top of courier rates. 
Where do you pick up from?
Our courier partners can pick up nationwide. Our pick-ups are free as well.
Do you offer Cash on Delivery?
Yes, we offer Cash on Delivery with weekly remittances.

generated_description:
**Shipmates: Simplifying Shipping for Online Merchants in the Philippines**

Welcome to Shipmates, a game-changing shipping platform designed specifically for online merchants in the Philippines. Founded in 2021 and backed by Y Combinator (Batch S22), Shipmates is on a mission to streamline the shipping process for e-commerce businesses, allowing them to focus more on growth and less on logistics.

### What Does Shipmates Do?

Initially launched to eliminate the complexities of manual booking, Shipmates enables online store owners to book on-demand and standard orders through various couriers—think Lalamove, Grab, and J&T, among others—all in one place. With a user-friendly platform, business owners can connect their Shopify store or simply upload orders via an Excel file. In just a few clicks, they can manage bulk shipments seamlessly.

### Key Features:

- **Multi-Courier Access**: Easily compare rates and choose from multiple couriers. Now, shipping isn’t just a chore; it’s a streamlined process.
- **Cash on Delivery & Free Pick-Ups**: Take advantage of nationwide shipping plus cash-on-delivery options, all with no additional pick-up fees.
- **Tracking & Automation**: Track all shipments from one dashboard and enjoy automatic waybill generation, saving you precious time and hassle.

### Pricing Structure:

Shipmates operates on a pay-per-use model, ensuring you only pay for what you use. This is structured into three tiers based on monthly shipment volumes:

1. **Level 1**: No minimum shipments required – ₱10.00 per booking.
2. **Level 2**: Minimum of 500 shipments per month – ₱7.50 per booking.
3. **Level 3**: Minimum of 1,000 shipments per month – ₱5.00 per booking.

### Our Philosophy:

At Shipmates, we believe that online businesses deserve robust support in shipping. Our team, based in Makati and comprised of just 12 employees, prioritizes continuous product development and user-friendly design, ensuring that every feature enhances the shipping experience for our users.

In the crowded field of logistics, Shipmates stands out not just because of what we offer, but also because of the valuable partnerships we've forged with leading couriers and the commitment we have to our clients.

### Client Testimonials:

Users rave about how Shipmates has transformed their workflow. For instance, Chrislyn from HGHMNDS CLOTHING highlights the convenience of having everything in one platform, while Alexa from Twin Starr Tailoring appreciates the intuitive design and responsive customer support.

To sum it all up, if you're in the business of e-commerce in the Philippines and looking to simplify your shipping process, Shipmates is ready to be your co-pilot. Check us out at [shipmates.app](https://shipmates.app) and start your shipping journey today!

---

Feel free to reach out for a demo or sign up for free—let's get your products on their way!
